<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Shrouded Step](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2291)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 80 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you move this delicately carved poplar wand, it looks indistinct, leaving a trail of afterimages in its wake.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_fleet step_](/Spells.aspx?ID=122). For the duration of the spell, you're also [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) while you Stride.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _fleet step_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wand of Shrouded Step
